text: What do you want, you stupid thief!
I’m telling you, I didn’t steal your food.
Yeah, tell that to some other fool.
I wanted to ask if you know any place where I could get medicine for the elder.
Why waste something that valuable on an old geezer like him when you could give it to me?
I might even pardon your theft.
Doesn’t matter anyway. I don’t know anywhere you could get medicine.
Except up TOP, of course — but we both know neither of us has that kind of money.
